Hi,

Is there an issue way to convert from Float64 to Float32 in a structure?

```@with_kw_noshow struct NLneurons{R, Tλ, TF, TFv, TFw}
	I::R		= 0.0
	er::R		= 1.0
	lambda::R	= 0.
	tauw::R		= 0.1
	@assert tauw > 0

	b::R		= 0.0
	vr::R		= -1.
	dw::R		= 1.5
	J::R		= 1.0
	invTauw::R	= 1 / tauw
	a_bar::R	= 0.511

	#rate function
	λ::Tλ = v -> exp(v)

	# CVX function for the vector field
	F::TF = v -> exp(v) - v

	Fv::TFv = (v, w) -> F(v) - w - lambda + I
	Fw::TFw = (v, w) -> (a_bar * v - w) * invTauw
end```
Say I have `p = NLneurons()`  for which  `R = Float64`.  How can I “easily” set R = Float32?
